data.name: Marmoreal Demo
data.detailed_description:
This is the demo for Marmoreal, a Bullet Hell Action RPG with magical girls, swords and fully automatic crossbows.

Join the Mages of the Arcanum and the Warriors of Melkirion in their battles against the armies of the undead in their quest to stop the evil Necromancer from becoming an immortal Lich!

Demo Features:
  • Three story missions. Play through the beginning of both campaigns, giving a short introduction to the story.
  • All six characters playable. Play as a varied cast consisting of mages, knights, soldiers and living suits of armor, each with their own unique abilities and weapons.
  • 36 different enemy types. Fight various enemies ranging from simple skeletons and zombies, to wisps, golems, wraiths and magical clones.
  • Survival Mode. Fight increasingly stronger waves of enemies for the chance to gain rare rewards and resources.
  • Dungeon Mode. Explore procedurally generated dungeons filled with enemies and treasure.

data.short_description: This is the demo for Marmoreal, a Bullet Hell Action RPG with magical girls, swords and fully automatic crossbows. Join the Mages of the Arcanum and the Warriors of Melkirion in their quest to stop the evil Necromancer!

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel(R) Core(TM) i5-7300HQ
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GTX 1050 Ti
  • Storage: 4 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: AMD Ryzen 5 3600X
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GTX 1050 Ti
  • Storage: 4 GB available space
